label: 太宰府
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: The government headquarters in Kyushu established as a regular office in the Taihō code of 701 and charged with diplomatic and defense responsibilities in addition to the administration of the provinces of Kyushu during the Heian period. During the Kamakura period, the office of Dazaifu functioned in name only.　[大宝律令]
